item.description:
Blue Valentine
Coolidge Corner Theater
Sunday Morning, December 12, 2010
Talk Cinema

The promotion for this film has generated a lot of interest.
Try to purchase your $20.00 ticket in advance.

Early Sunday mornings in Coolidge Corner are a delight once you get over the shock of being awake.
Please join me for this opportunity to see a film with positive buzz before it hits theaters. I have never been disappointed by Ryan Gosling or Michelle Williams star power and dramatic picks.

This Weekend: BLUE VALENTINE
Journalist Laura Blum will host this Sunday's Talk Cinema selection, which is the story of a Scranton, PA young married couple, played by Ryan Gosling and Michelle Williams, struggling to make the rent. The film cuts back and forth between their present hardships, possibly ending in divorce, and their courtship as young lovers. Directed by Derek Cianfrance.
item.how_to_find_us: 9:15 am Panera Bread meet Betsey for breakfast, coffee, chat BIAM red meetup sign visible 9:40 Coolidge for optimal seating
item.name: Blue Valentine at Talk Cinema Dec 12 at 9:15 am
